definition: to break (e.g. stick or bone)/a loss
to turn sth over/to turn upside down/to tip sth out (of a container)

to break/to fracture/to snap/to suffer loss/to bend/to twist/to turn/to change direction/convinced/to convert into (currency)/discount/rebate/tenth (in price)/classifier for theatrical scenes/to fold/accounts book

sentences.english: These camping chairs can be folded away.
sentences.chinese: 这些折椅可以折叠起来。

sentences.english: He tied them to a lawn chair and filled them with helium.
sentences.chinese: 他将气球绑在折椅上并注入氦气。

sentences.english: One day, while sitting outside in his lawn chair, Larry had his eureka moment.
sentences.chinese: 一天，当拉里坐在屋外的折椅上时，突然灵机一动。

sentences.english: Hundreds of us sit together, side by side, in rows of wooden folding chairs on the main campus lawn.
sentences.chinese: 我们几百个学生并排坐在校园大草坪的木折椅上。

sentences.english: These camping chairs can be folded away and put in the car.
sentences.chinese: 这些轻便折椅可以叠起来放进汽车。

sentences.english: We find Red slouched in a folding chair, watching the movie.
sentences.chinese: 瑞德则懒懒地蜷在折椅上，看着电影。
